name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Animal Crossing Radio | Live Hourly Animal Crossing Music

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Animal Crossing music from all the games in live ! Enjoy the best hourly Animal Crossing music right now !

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Animal Crossing Radio brings the delightful tunes of Animal Crossing directly to your browser, offering a unique way to enjoy the charming melodies of your favorite game series in real time.

Features:

üïê Live Hourly Music:

Experience the magic of Animal Crossing with live, hourly music updates synced to the real clock, just like in the actual game.

üéÆ Change Games: 

Switch between music from different Animal Crossing titles, including New Horizons, New Leaf, City Folk, Wild World, Population Growing and more, to suit your nostalgic preferences.

üå§Ô∏è Change Weather: 

Adjust the music playlist to match various in-game weather conditions, enhancing the atmospheric feel of your virtual experience.

üëç Play Any Music You Want:

Enjoy the flexibility to play any specific track or soundtrack from the Animal Crossing series, discover the music library.

üéß Continues When Closed:

Keep the music playing even when you close the extension, ensuring uninterrupted enjoyment of your favorite Animal Crossing tunes.

Whether you're working, studying, or simply relaxing, Animal Crossing Radio transports you to the tranquil and cheerful world of Animal Crossing through its soothing music. Install now and let the melodies of your favorite game accompany you wherever you go!
